# Node TS API Snippets

This snippets works best with [node-ts-api-starter](https://github.com/stuworx/node-ts-api-starter) project

# Snippets

| Snippet | Renders                    |
| ------- | -------------------------- |
| cc      | controller class           |
| sc      | service class              |
| cm      | controller method          |
| sm      | service method             |
| ni      | new interface              |
| ns      | new schema                 |
| nst     | new schema with timestamps |
| ndb     | new db                     |
| scu     | service create user        |

# Todos
